TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 300
TEI.2.document_title: John C. Partin to Cooper and Cheeves, 12-12-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: John C. Partin to Cooper and Cheeves, December 12, 1829. Partin contracts to lease half of the land which he may receive to Cooper and Cheeves in return for payment by them of all fees on his grant. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 300

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John C. Partin to Cooper and Cheeves, December 12, 1829. Partin contracts to lease half of the land which he may receive to Cooper and Cheeves in return for payment by them of all fees on his grant. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="12-12-1829">December 12, 1829,*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
*/div1*
